prod_desc: Fire up Ultimate General Magmar to defeat the opponents!
prod_long_desc:
Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets feature awesome minifigures with futuristic battle gear. Attach the fists for extra battle power, or insert the circular saw blades or whirlwind blades into the ultra armor and turn the handle to make them rotate. This set features 3 scannable shields for NEXO Powers that provide unique battle skills in the digital game, and includes an Ultimate General Magmar minifigure.
Includes an Ultimate General Magmar minifigure.
Ultimate General Magmar merges live-action play with 3 scannable shields to obtain unique NEXO Powers for digital gaming.
Turn the handle on Ultimate General Magmar's back to spin the blades.
Weapons include a sword, 2 translucent-orange circular saw blades, and 2 translucent-blue whirlwind blades.
Accessory elements include 2 fist smashers, shield and a showcase stand.
This set offers an age-appropriate building experience for ages 7-14.
Stands over 2” tall.
Download the free LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™: MERLOK 2.0 app to your smartphone or tablet. Ask your parents' or guardians' permission before going online.
Scan shields for each of the 3 NEXO Powers (Rock Ripper, Whirlwind and Mightiness) and power up in the LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ game.
Collect and combine all the Ultimate LEGO® NEXO KNIGHTS™ sets to boost your collection of ultimate battle gear.
Watch all your favorite NEXO KNIGHTS™ episodes on Cartoon Network.
